Package lib.homies.framework.spigot.utils

Class SpigotInventoryUtils

java.lang.Object
lib.homies.framework.spigot.utils.SpigotInventoryUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
InventoryUtils
public class SpigotInventoryUtils extends Object implements InventoryUtils
Spigot-specific implementation of the InventoryUtils interface. This class provides utility methods for manipulating Bukkit Inventory instances.

  • Method Details

    • fill

      public void fill(HomiesInventory inventory, HomiesItemStack item)
      Fills an entire HomiesInventory with a specific HomiesItemStack. The inventory and item must be Spigot-specific implementations.
      Specified by:
      fill in interface InventoryUtils
      Parameters:
      inventory - The HomiesInventory to fill. Must be a SpigotInventory.
      item - The HomiesItemStack to use as filler. Must be a SpigotItemStack.

    • fillBorders

      public void fillBorders(HomiesInventory inventory, HomiesItemStack item)
      Fills the border slots of a HomiesInventory with a specific HomiesItemStack. Assumes a standard 9-slot row inventory layout. The inventory and item must be Spigot-specific implementations.
      Specified by:
      fillBorders in interface InventoryUtils
      Parameters:
      inventory - The HomiesInventory to fill the borders of. Must be a SpigotInventory.
      item - The HomiesItemStack to use as filler for the borders. Must be a SpigotItemStack.

    • paginate

      public List<HomiesItemStack> paginate(List<HomiesItemStack> items, int page, int perPage)
      Paginates a list of HomiesItemStacks, returning a sublist for a specific page. This method is platform-agnostic and only handles list slicing.
      Specified by:
      paginate in interface InventoryUtils
      Parameters:
      items - The full list of HomiesItemStacks to paginate.
      page - The 1-indexed page number to retrieve.
      perPage - The maximum number of items per page.
      Returns:
      A List of HomiesItemStacks for the specified page.
